author: ciro.gelvez
title: Food produced with Agriculture 4.0
description: 传统农业无法获得作物状况的实时数据，而这些数据可以提高产量并赋予最终产品以价值。

f6_assessments.q0: 我祝贺该团队提出的这个伟大的提案，尤其是对背景和我们需要解决这个复杂问题的不同边缘的原因的精彩阐述。为了从技术以及历史方面解决这个问题，该团队提出了一系列解决方案，如在整个分销网络、物联网设备和保险公司的数据处理中发展 "智能合约 "等等。虽然这看起来是一个雄心勃勃的项目，但该团队包括一个流程图，解释他们期望如何在经济上可持续发展。总之，如果这里提出的内容得以实施，不仅对Cardano，而且对整个行业都将是一个巨大的成功。扩展到其他领域的可能性将是无限的。
f6_assessments.q1: 对团队成员的技能和经验有非常详细的描述，以及他们在LinkedIn上的总结，另外还提供了一个链接到他们的创业公司--Wseeds的网站，在那里你可以看到一个传感器的原型。还有一个预算部分，其中显示了明确的项目，以及对项目如何实施的清晰描述。我认为预算部分的项目是适当的。正如我将在下面描述的那样，为了确保社区安全，有几个方面的可行性必须得到改善。(1) 我想向你指出，目前还不完全清楚你的初创公司是否还处于理论阶段，或者他们是否已经在物联网解决方案领域有成功的经验。如果是后者，那么介绍一下迄今为止的成功数据就会很有意思。(2) 虽然预算有积极的一面，但团队应该提供更多的细节，以便社区能够准确评估，例如，要求15000美元用于开发智能合约，需要提出每小时的费用和估计承包时间。(3) 没有提到成功实施的可能风险，对我来说，这么大的项目在路上显然会遇到很多风险。特别是，我将真正喜欢读到哥伦比亚立法在这一领域的好处和限制，以及你们计划如何处理这些问题。
f6_assessments.q2: 这份提案清楚地描述了4个可交付的成果，第一个是改进他们目前拥有的传感器，第二个是改进平台，第三个是拥有一个自动温室（令人激动！），最后是他们计划获得的市场份额。虽然提出的时间表是最短3个月，最长12个月，但我认为我可以做一个更好的描述。虽然我理解提案的复杂性，但我建议如果得到资助，在市政厅或在未来的催化剂周期提案中提出一个甘特类型的图形元素。另一个方面，我建议改善可审计性，考虑转向开放源码，第二个是更多的建议，探索SingularityNET的解决方案，以改善他们的IA模型。
f6_assessments.reply: We are so grateful about your comments. That give us a clear idea about what we need to do better.

f6_assessments.q0:
总体想法和产品（包括技术和作物）都很好。从提案来看，它似乎在提供这两种产品。  我主要担心的是，考虑到这是一个新成立的公司，没有多少资源，最初的重点和努力被分割。当然，商业模式必须经过测试，但在开始时，也许只专注于一个（技术/服务或最终产品的商业化）会更好。
我喜欢这里有一个价值链的例子，这使我更容易理解所提供的东西。
 
总之，也不清楚提案本身如何真正影响挑战。它说它是一家哥伦比亚的初创公司，但它没有说它已经在哪个国家出现，也没有说如果得到资助，它打算扩展到哪个国家。在此明确这一业务/扩张计划，将使评估其影响更加容易。此外，提供所应用的技术或最终产品并不一定能使人们更加了解它或使社区发展。对于那些将要使用它的人来说，有一个教育的步骤，以使他们了解并对Blochain等感兴趣。这个步骤在这里也不清楚。

最后，我看到它也缺乏对最终产品价格的经济分析。人们是否愿意为之付费？如果不是，这个项目在经济上是不可行的，尽管这个技术很了不起。
f6_assessments.q1:
有一个已经致力于此的团队，作为一个初创公司，这可能会验证他们的能力。该团队的简历可以通过Linkedin链接来验证。
有一个坚实的技术发展计划，但我错过了商业/扩张计划的更多细节，特别是如果我们谈论的是公司的资金问题。有些活动似乎比它应该花的时间要长一些（例如，它说需要6个月来 "为项目创建视频宣传"，这是一个很大的问题）。

预算细目是公平和合理的
f6_assessments.q2:
项目的开发/验证阶段有一些里程碑，但在商业开发/商业化阶段也有一些指标，但可以有一些销售上升的预期来评估它的时间。这些指标与时间无关。

最后，关于风险，这个项目是关于技术和市场开发。这使得它真的很有风险，因为技术可能不工作，而消费者可能不想要这个产品。一个初步的成本效益分析应该在事前完成。
f6_assessments.reply: This is a really complete feedback. Thank you. We will make it work.

f6_assessments.q0: This seems like a perfect example of a proposal that meets all of the goals for the challenge and potentially brings a new industry on to the cardano blockchain. I love that this proposal specifically addresses a regional issue and supports local communities with a combination of on-chain and off-chain solutions. This proposal helps reduce the inequality of resources and data access between small farmers and industrial plantations, therefore helping smaller farms compete on the global markets.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposers have put together an undeniable experienced team, with a significant variety of relevant experts. Along with a very detailed explanation of the technology and plan for implementing the proposal it is highly likely this proposal will be implemented successfully. The timeline and  budget is reasonable and outlined clearly, allowing the community to have confidence in the project team and gives the community ample opportunities to assess the progress of the project.
f6_assessments.q2: One of the best proposals for the community to audit and ensure the team is implementing the project correctly. Very few project that clearly identifies all the key members of the proposal, which makes it much easier for the community to proposers accountable for the success and failures of the project. It is clear that transparency and audibility are priorities for the proposal team. The proposal offers a realistic timetable to complete the work and provides enough information to audit the progress and the success of the proposal.
f6_assessments.reply: We are so grateful about your comments. Thanks a lot.

f6_assessments.q0:
The use of smart contract to improve the agriculture production is a also a good way to promote the use of Cardano ecosystem by the farmers.
This proposal would give an opportunity to people from various fields and background to learn about. Farmers, distributers and consumers. The proposal it's in alignment with the challenge
f6_assessments.q1:
It would be innovative  to introduce the smart contract in this system of agriculture as proposed trhough this project.
The timeframe seems reasonable,same thing for the budget, even if some sections would need some details.
A strong team is behind this proposal, formed by experienced people in various fields, necessary to bring in some expertise for its success, added to that, all the experience of the Wseeds in that field. What I would like to point out is that I didn't find a specific region in Colombia where this project will be starting from, and also no reference to the collaboration with local authorities, as in such initiatives, those instances/people may slow things down if they don't buy in.
f6_assessments.q2: The company already has a website , where I assume this new project will be published for a possibility for community to check the progress. The roadmap of the project isdetailed and dates defined.
f6_assessments.reply: We are so grateful about your comments. Thanks a lot.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proponent clearly understands what needs to be done for the proposal.
The given problem statement is very clear and involves several aspects of the challenge. This proposition has great potential! Smart contracts in agriculture are a revolution
f6_assessments.q1:
Undoubtedly, the team set out to develop the project is quality. Proposal provides information about team members with relevant skills and experience for successful project implementation.
According to the proposal presented, it shows enthusiasm and seriousness for the proposal, however the scope of the proposal is quite wide so it would be better to give a list of potential risks and challenges in this regard. future. To increase the probability of the proposal's success.
f6_assessments.q2:
Multiple smaller milestones within each core milestone will indicate more confidence in the expected delivery to be successful.
No go-to-market strategy, no timeline, no budget analysis to see if the amount is right. Which list is generic so it's hard to check
There is no real roadmap with milestones or KPIs provided, making it difficult to track the progress and success of this project.
f6_assessments.reply: We are so grateful about your comments. That give us a clear idea about what we need to do better.

f6_assessments.q0:
The explanation of the problem raised by this proposal and the solution provided are clear and understandable. 
This proposal fits well into the problems to be addressed by the Challenge. In the sense that it would raise awareness in South America about how Cadano works, but also improve the lives of people and support the development of local communities. In addition, the success of this project would have the potential to impact the rest of the world and promote the skills of your team and partners. 
The only thing missing would be to explicitly highlight the benefits of this proposal for the Catalyst eco-system, even if these are understandable. The same goes for the KPIs which are not clearly linked to the challenge indicators, although they are concise and detailed.
f6_assessments.q1: All the information about the proposers is detailed, clear, proven and seems to match with the skills needed to carry out the project. It is nice to have such a clear picture of the members of the team. The budget seems to be in line with the needs of the mission, coordinated and coherent. The plan is quite detailed even if some elements may seems abstract for people who are not familiar with these fields. It would perhaps lack a precision on the possible risks of the project and the indicators of how the team would respond to them. But the technical aspects and the contextualisation are rather clear and appreciable.
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap is clear and seems to be realistic and coherent, as well as the corresponding time indices seem reasonable and well coordinated. The KIPs make sense and are articulated in themes (AgroBoxes, Wseeds platform, AgroLab) which facilitates understanding. However, there is a lack of information about the solutions provided in order to trace the progression of this proposal within the community.
f6_assessments.reply: We are so grateful about your comments. That give us a clear idea about what we need to do better.

solution: 通过我们的Agro-box和农民、分销商和消费者之间的智能合约，从我们的可持续作物中获得农产品
experience: 实验植物学家、软件工程师、生物工程师、经济学家、有2年开发农业技术经验的创业者。
